item.title: Hetzner: First European hoster with Ampere ® Altra ® based dedicated servers
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen, Germany – 19 July 2022

    Hetzner: First European hoster with Ampere ® Altra ® based dedicated servers

    Hetzner Online just launched two new dedicated servers with an Ampere Arm-based Cloud Native Processor. This makes Hetzner the first on-demand hoster in Europe to provide Arm-based dedicated servers for...

    Show more

item.title: Flexible networking now also for Hetzner cloud servers
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen/Germany – 28 June 2022

    Flexible networking now also for Hetzner cloud servers

    Today, Hetzner expanded the product set of its Cloud platform to include Primary IPs. With this new feature, customers can now choose from three different network options.

    Show more

item.title: Hetzner in the spotlight for the Readers’ Choice Service Provider Award
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen/Frankfurt, Germany – 03 June 2022

    Hetzner in the spotlight for the Readers’ Choice Service Provider Award

    Every year, the 10 online platforms from Vogel IT-Medien call on their readers to participate in a readers’ choice survey to decide who are the best of the best in IT.

    Show more

item.title: Hetzner Online announces cooperation with Ampere
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen, Germany – 25 March 2022

    Hetzner Online announces cooperation with Ampere

    Hetzner Online is one of the first European web hosting companies to place its trust in the expertise of the CPU manufacturer Ampere Computing.

    Show more

item.title: Statement concerning the website war.ukraine.ua
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen/Germany – 09 March 2022

    Statement concerning the website war.ukraine.ua

    In the evening of 7 March 2022, we learned via Twitter that we are being held responsible for the shutdown of the war.ukraine.ua website.

    Show more

item.title: Hetzner Data Center Park Helsinki has expanded with a new data center
item.content:encoded:
• Tuusula, Finland – 08 November 2021

    Hetzner Data Center Park Helsinki has expanded with a new data center

    Hetzner Data Center Park Helsinki in southern Tuusula - recently expanded to include another new data center, which was put into operation in July 2021.

    Show more

item.title: Hetzner Goes USA! – Hetzner opens new location in USA
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen, Germany – 03 November 2021

    Hetzner Goes USA! – Hetzner opens new location in USA

    Hetzner Cloud now also has servers in Ashburn, Virgina, their first location outside of Europe. This means that in addition to Nuremberg, Falkenstein and Helsinki, customers can now also choose...

    Show more

item.title: Hetzner wins platinum in the category cloud server
item.content:encoded:
• Frankfurt am Main/Gunzenhausen, Germany – 02 September 2021

    Hetzner wins platinum in the category cloud server

    Hetzner Online once again earned the top place on the winners' podium this year in the "Cloud Server" category and took home the "Platinum" prize.

    Show more

item.title: Setup special at Hetzner in September
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen, Germany – 01 September 2021

    Setup special at Hetzner in September

    This September, Hetzner Online has slashed prices for several of their dedicated root servers.

    Show more

item.title: Hetzner now offering AMD EPYC™ 7003 Series processor powered cloud servers
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen, Germany – 31 March 2021

    Hetzner now offering AMD EPYC™ 7003 Series processor powered cloud servers

    Hetzner Online is now offering six new models of dedicated vCPU cloud servers which are equipped with the newest AMD EPYC™ Series processor.

    Show more
